MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in East Camus Place and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.53pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at East Camus Place substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.50pm on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
